title: A bɛ baara kɛ cogo min na - Orbital Temple
heading: A bɛ baara kɛ cogo min na
intro: Orbital Temple porozɛ bɛ kɛ ni fɛn saba ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn kan, minnu bɛ baara kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ walasa ka tɔgɔw ci batoso ma sankolo la.
paragraph1: Sateliti bɛ dugukolo lamini ni a janya ye bam 525 ɲɔgɔn ye, a bɛ tɔgɔw mara a hakili la. Dugukolo kan garasiw bɛ kumaɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni sateliti ye a tɛmɛtuma na, ka tɔgɔ minnu ci mɔgɔw ma, u bɛ olu ci siti in fɛ.
paragraph2: N’i ye tɔgɔ dɔ Di, a bɛ Dòn layini dɔ la, wa a bɛna Lase sateliti ma tɛmɛsira nata sɔrɔli waati la. I bɛna imɛri ka dantigɛli sɔrɔ ni i tɔgɔ bilala ka ɲɛ Orbital Temple kɔnɔ.
